net.hudup.core.alg

Class RecommendFilterParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.hudup.core.alg.RecommendFilterParam
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    @NextUpdate
public class RecommendFilterParam
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Before recommendation task is performed (for example, producing a list of recommended items), the filtering tasks are performed. Filtering task is specified in Filter class. Concretely, filtering task is coded in the method filter(...) of Filter class. As a convention, this is called filter parameter. Filter parameter can contain any information. In current implementation, filter parameter is very simple, which only contains item identifier (item ID). Filter parameter need to be improved in the future.
    Version:
    10.0
    Author:
    Loc Nguyen
    See Also:

      • create

        public static RecommendFilterParam create(int itemId)
        Creating a filter parameter. Because the only default constructor is private, this method is used to create a filter parameter.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        new filter parameter.
